name: Yenchke
wishText: May God bless you and the war in your country ends soon, bringing peace, healing, and brighter days for everyone. :)))
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Ira!! I hope everything goes well for you this year...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now stop smiling and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
